TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit SKShader extends SkiaSharp.SKObject

Docs.summary: Shaders specify the source color(s) for what is being drawn in the .

MemberSignature.Value: public static SkiaSharp.SKShader CreateBitmap (SkiaSharp.SKBitmap src);
.method public static hidebysig class SkiaSharp.SKShader CreateBitmap(class SkiaSharp.SKBitmap src) cil managed

Docs.param: The bitmap to use inside the shader.
Docs.summary: Creates a new shader that will draw with the specified bitmap.
Docs.returns: Returns a new , or an empty shader on error. This function never returns null.

remarks.format:
## Remarks
If the bitmap cannot be used (has no pixels, or its dimensions exceed implementation limits) then an empty shader may be returned. If the source bitmap's color type is <xref:SkiaSharp.SKColorType.Alpha8> then that mask will be colorized using the color on the paint.

The tiling mode to use when sampling the bitmap in the y-direction.
Docs.summary: Creates a new shader that will draw with the specified bitmap.
Docs.returns: Returns a new , or an empty shader on error. This function never returns null.

remarks.format:
## Remarks
If the bitmap cannot be used (has no pixels, or its dimensions exceed implementation limits) then an empty shader may be returned. If the source bitmap's color type is <xref:SkiaSharp.SKColorType.Alpha8> then that mask will be colorized using the color on the paint.

MemberSignature.Value: public static SkiaSharp.SKShader CreateCompose (SkiaSharp.SKShader shaderA, SkiaSharp.SKShader shaderB);
.method public static hidebysig class SkiaSharp.SKShader CreateCompose(class SkiaSharp.SKShader shaderA, class SkiaSharp.SKShader shaderB) cil managed

Docs.param: The colors from this shader are seen as the destination by the blend mode.
The colors from this shader are seen as the source by the blend mode.
Docs.summary: Create a new compose shader, which combines two shaders by the blend mode.
Docs.returns: Returns a new , or an empty shader on error. This function never returns null.

Docs.returns: Returns a new , or an empty shader on error. This function never returns null.

.method public static hidebysig class SkiaSharp.SKShader CreatePerlinNoiseFractalNoise(float32 baseFrequencyX, float32 baseFrequencyY, int32 numOctaves, float32 seed) cil managed

Docs.param: The frequency in the x-direction in the range of 0..1.
The frequency in the y-direction in the range of 0..1.
The number of octaves, usually fairly small.
The randomization seed.
Docs.summary: Creates a new shader that draws Perlin fractal noise.
Docs.returns: Returns a new , or an empty shader on error. This function never returns null.

MemberSignature.Value: public static SkiaSharp.SKShader CreatePerlinNoiseFractalNoise (float baseFrequencyX, float baseFrequencyY, int numOctaves, float seed, SkiaSharp.SKPointI tileSize);

.method public static hidebysig class SkiaSharp.SKShader CreatePerlinNoiseFractalNoise(float32 baseFrequencyX, float32 baseFrequencyY, int32 numOctaves, float32 seed, valuetype SkiaSharp.SKPointI tileSize) cil managed

Docs.param: The frequency in the x-direction in the range of 0..1.
The frequency in the y-direction in the range of 0..1.
The number of octaves, usually fairly small.
The randomization seed.
The tile size used to modify the frequencies so that the noise will be tileable for the given size.
Docs.summary: Creates a new shader that draws Perlin fractal noise.
Docs.returns: Returns a new , or an empty shader on error. This function never returns null.

MemberSignature.Value: public static SkiaSharp.SKShader CreatePerlinNoiseFractalNoise (float baseFrequencyX, float baseFrequencyY, int numOctaves, float seed, SkiaSharp.SKSizeI tileSize);

Docs.param: The base frequency in the X direction.
The base frequency in the Y direction.
The number of octaves, usually a value between 1 and 10.
The seed value used to initialize the random number generator.
The tile size used to modify the frequencies for tiling.
Docs.summary: Creates a new shader that produces fractal Perlin noise with a specified tile size.
Docs.returns: Returns a new .

MemberSignature.Value: public static SkiaSharp.SKShader CreatePicture (SkiaSharp.SKPicture src, SkiaSharp.SKShaderTileMode tmx, SkiaSharp.SKShaderTileMode tmy, SkiaSharp.SKRect tile);

.method public static hidebysig class SkiaSharp.SKShader CreatePicture(class SkiaSharp.SKPicture src, valuetype SkiaSharp.SKShaderTileMode tmx, valuetype SkiaSharp.SKShaderTileMode tmy, valuetype SkiaSharp.SKRect tile) cil managed

Docs.param: The picture to use inside the shader.
The tiling mode to use when sampling the picture in the x-direction.
The tiling mode to use when sampling the picture in the y-direction.
The tile rectangle in picture coordinates.
Docs.summary: Creates a new shader that will draw with the specified picture.
Docs.returns: Returns a new , or an empty shader on error. This function never returns null.

remarks.format:
## Remarks
The tile rectangle represents the subset (or superset) of the picture used when building a tile. It is not affected by the local matrix and does not imply scaling (only translation and cropping).

Docs.summary: Creates a new shader that will draw with the specified picture.
Docs.returns: Returns a new , or an empty shader on error. This function never returns null.

remarks.format:
## Remarks
The tile rectangle represents the subset (or superset) of the picture used when building a tile. It is not affected by the local matrix and does not imply scaling (only translation and cropping).

MemberSignature.Value: public static SkiaSharp.SKShader CreatePicture (SkiaSharp.SKPicture src, SkiaSharp.SKShaderTileMode tmx, SkiaSharp.SKShaderTileMode tmy, SkiaSharp.SKFilterMode filterMode, SkiaSharp.SKMatrix localMatrix, SkiaSharp.SKRect tile);

.method public static hidebysig class SkiaSharp.SKShader CreatePicture(class SkiaSharp.SKPicture src, valuetype SkiaSharp.SKShaderTileMode tmx, valuetype SkiaSharp.SKShaderTileMode tmy, valuetype SkiaSharp.SKFilterMode filterMode, valuetype SkiaSharp.SKMatrix localMatrix, valuetype SkiaSharp.SKRect tile) cil managed

Docs.param: The picture to use inside the shader.
The tile mode in the X direction.
The tile mode in the Y direction.
The filter mode to use when sampling the picture.
The matrix to apply before applying the shader.
The tile rectangle in picture coordinates.
Docs.summary: Creates a new shader that will draw with the specified picture, filter mode, transformation matrix, and tile rectangle.
Docs.returns: Returns a new .

MemberSignature.Value: protected override void Dispose (bool disposing);
.method familyhidebysig virtual instance void Dispose(bool disposing) cil managed

Docs.param: to release both managed and unmanaged resources; to release only unmanaged resources.
Docs.summary: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the and optionally releases the managed resources.
Docs.remarks: Always dispose the object before you release your last reference to the . Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the finalizer.
